templates.name: Bash脚本基础示例
templates.description: 展示变量、函数、条件判断和文件操作的基础Shell脚本
templates.content:
#!/bin/bash
# The first bin/bash line tells the system to use the Bash interpreter.

# This is a comment,Comments start with # and are ignored by the shell.
# echo is used to print text to the console.
echo "Hello, World!"

# This is a variable,Variables are used to store values.
var="value"
name="DevOps"

# Bash has no explicit data types. Variables are treated as strings by default, but you can perform arithmetic operations using (( )):
count=5
((count++))
echo "Count: $count"



# This is a function,Functions are defined using the function keyword followed by the function name and parentheses.
function greet() {
  # The  variable is used to access the first argument passed to the function.
  echo "Hello, $1!"
}

# Calling the function and passing an argument.
greet "John"

# This is an if statement,If statements are used to execute a block of code if a condition is true.
if [ "$var" == "value" ]; then
    echo "Variable is equal to 'value'"
fi

# while loop
count=0
while [ $count -lt 5 ]; do
    echo "Count: $count"
    ((count++))
done

# ----- 7.file operations ------

# reading from a file
while read line; do
    echo "Line: $line"
done < file.txt

# writing to a file
echo "Hello, World!" > output.txt

templates.name: 磁盘空间监控
templates.description: 检查磁盘空间使用情况并在超过阈值时发出警告
templates.content:
#!/bin/bash
# This script check the disk space usage and issue a warning if it's above the threshold.

# Set the threshold for disk usage (in percentage)
threshold=90
# Get the disk usage percentage
# We use the df command to get disk usage information for the root filesystem (/).
# tail -n 1 extracts the last line of the df output.
# awk '{print $5}' extracts the fifth column, which contains the usage percentage.
disk_usage=$(df -h / | tail -n 1 | awk '{print $5}' | sed 's/%//')
# We compare the usage percentage to the threshold and provide a warning if it exceeds the limit.
if [ "$disk_usage" -ge "$threshold" ]; then
    echo "Disk space is running low! Disk Usage: $disk_usage%"
else
    echo "Disk space is within acceptable limits. Disk Usage: $disk_usage%"
fi

templates.description: 使用top命令获取并显示CPU总使用率百分比
templates.content:
#!/bin/bash

# Get CPU usage percentage
# We use the top command to get CPU usage information.
# `top -bn1` runs top in batch mode for a single iteration.
# `grep "Cpu(s)"` filters out the CPU usage line.
# `awk '{print $2 + $4}'` extracts the CPU usage percentage from the line.
cpu_usage=$(top -bn1 | grep "Cpu(s)" | awk '{print $2 + $4}')
echo "CPU Usage: $cpu_usage%"

#!/bin/bash

# 定义要处理的CSV文件名
csv_file="data.csv"

# 使用while循环逐行读取CSV文件
# IFS=',' 设置字段分隔符为逗号
# read -r 以原始模式读取，防止反斜杠转义
# col1 col2 col3 分别代表第一、二、三列的数据变量

# 从指定的CSV文件中读取数据

#!/bin/bash

# 查看有多少远程的 IP 在连接本机(不管是通过 ssh 还是 web 还是 ftp 都统计) 
# 使用 netstat ‐atn 可以查看本机所有连接的状态,‐a 查看所有,
# -t仅显示 tcp 连接的信息,‐n 数字格式显示
# Local Address(第四列是本机的 IP 和端口信息)
# Foreign Address(第五列是远程主机的 IP 和端口信息)
# 使用 awk 命令仅显示第 5 列数据,再显示第 1 列 IP 地址的信息

netstat -atn  |  awk  '{print $5}'  | awk  '{print $1}' | sort -nr  |  uniq -c

templates.name: 网站状态检查
templates.description: 通过HTTP状态码检查网站是否可访问
templates.content:
#!/bin/bash

# Define a function to check the status of a website
check_website() {
    local url="$1"
    
    # The `-s` flag makes curl operate in silent mode, suppressing progress and error messages.
    # `-o /dev/null` discards the response body.
    # `-w "%{http_code}"` instructs curl to print only the HTTP response code.
    local response=$(curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" "$url")
    
    if [ "$response" == "200" ]; then
        echo "Website $url is up and running!"
    else
        echo "Website $url is down!"
    fi
}
# Call the function with a sample website
check_website "https://www.example.com"

templates.name: 日志归档压缩
templates.description: 自动归档并压缩30天前的日志文件
templates.content:
#!/bin/bash
# 定义日志目录和归档目录的路径变量
LOG_DIR="/var/log/myapp/"
ARCHIVE_DIR="/var/log/myapp/archive/"
# 查找日志目录中修改时间超过30天的日志文件，并将其移动到归档目录
find $LOG_DIR -name "*.log" -mtime +30 -exec mv {} $ARCHIVE_DIR \;
# 将归档目录中的所有日志文件进行gzip压缩
gzip $ARCHIVE_DIR/*.log
# 输出操作完成的信息
echo "Log files older than 30 days archived and compressed."

templates.name: Nginx服务管理脚本
templates.description: 用于启动、停止、重启和查看Nginx服务状态的脚本
templates.content:
#!/bin/bash

# 编写 nginx 启动脚本 
# 本脚本编写完成后,放置在/etc/init.d/目录下,就可以被 Linux 系统自动识别到该脚本
# 如果本脚本名为/etc/init.d/nginx,则 service nginx start 就可以启动该服务
# service nginx stop 就可以关闭服务
# service nginx restart 可以重启服务
# service nginx status 可以查看服务状态
program=/usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx
pid=/usr/local/nginx/logs/nginx.pid
start(){
if [ -f $pid ];then
  echo  "nginx 服务已经处于开启状态"
else
  $program
fi
stop(){
if [ -! -f $pid ];then
  echo "nginx 服务已经关闭"
else
  $program -s stop
  echo "关闭服务 ok"
fi
}
status(){
if [ -f $pid ];then
  echo "服务正在运行..."
else
  echo "服务已经关闭"
fi
}

case $1 in
start)
  start;;
stop)
  stop;;
restart)
  stop
  sleep 1
  start;;
status)
  status;;
*)
  echo  "你输入的语法格式错误"
esac

templates.description: 查找并显示Linux系统中的僵尸进程PID和命令

#!/bin/bash

# 查找 Linux 系统中的僵尸进程
# awk 判断 ps 命令输出的第 8 列为 Z 是,显示该进程的 PID 和进程命令
ps aux | awk '{if($8 == "Z"){print $2,$11}}'
